h2_title: Samadhi Fire Crystal and the Flint Bosses
content: Getting the Samadhi Fire Crystals will allow you to craft the Staff of Blazing Karma.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Secrets_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 5 Secrets', specifically from the subsection 'Samadhi Fire Crystal and the Flint Bosses'.
The content is as follows:
Getting the Samadhi Fire Crystals will allow you to craft the Staff of Blazing Karma.
